DOC.brief_summary: Measure accuracy of vein width using VeinViewer®, compared against ultrasound imaging as a gold standard
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Verification Evaluation of VeinViewer® Device
DOC.criteria: Must be 18 years of age or older Must be able to read and understand English to understand the consent letter Less than 18 years of age Unable to read and understand English to understand the consent letter
